Name: Hentai Weed PuZZles
About the game: This is a jigsaw puzzle game in which you need to put together pictures of anime chans, using scattered picture fragments on the screen. Features: -Game genre: a jigsaw puzzle -Game theme: anime -Various anime girls to choose (different suits, different hair color, different backgrounds) -Simple and fun gameplay (just choose a puzzle and drag the fragments to get the picture together) -Good soundtrack -Steam achievements
